Lawrence Weiner, a central figure of Conceptualism who profoundly altered the landscape of American art, has died at 79. “It was not ironic,” he said of his work. “It was not against anything except the entire culture. That’s what art is.”

​
In 1980, Barbie launched the first Hispanic doll and also the first Black and Asian dolls - an important step towards representation.​

Happy birthday to British typographer & graphic designer Margaret Calvert ⁣

Calvert’s work in transforming the UK’s road signage system, to the wayfinding at railway stations & airports, has been central in shaping much of our national visual identity.

1/ I am here to let you know that, over the next decade, art might actually save the world.

Our world is becoming progressively digital.   It is critically important that this world, the coming metaverse, is open and free and interoperable.

And art might get us there.
